column4: last shot for the night: Does anyone know how to associate a CUPS printer driver with a CUPS printer *without* using GUI tools?
ummm w3b lynx links2 or elinks   to 127.0.0.1:631 ?

erUSUL: Yes, I found the web GUI, and I can connect to it, but I can see no way to authenticate to it, so I'm just a guest and cannot do anything administrative (I get "403: Forbidden" on all those pages). Do you know how I can authenticate with the CUPS web GUI?
